param.name: _pw_pvpython_script
param.label: Path to the Python Script
param.help: See workflow description for more information on how to prepare this script

param.name: _pw_jobdir
param.label: OpenFOAM Job Directory
param.help: This directory is used to search for case.foam files with command [find path/to/dir -maxdepth 2 -name case.foam]

param.name: _pw_load_paraview
param.label: Command to Load Paraview
param.help: E.g.: module load, spack load, source, export PATH=, etc

param.name: _pw__pvhost__sch__dd_partition_e_
param.label: Slurm Partition
param.help: Name of the SLURM partition to run the Paraview Python script

param.name: _pw_pvhost_scheduler_directives
param.label: Scheduler Directives
param.help: e.g. --mem=1000;--gpus-per-node=1 - Use the semicolon character ; to separate parameters. Do not include the SBATCH keyword.

param.name: _pw_controller
param.label: Controller host
param.help: Use hostname@ip or a proxy like PoolName.clusters.pw. Use pw.conf to get PoolName from pw.conf

param.name: _pw_use_dex
param.label: Display Results in Design Explorer?
param.help: Select Yes to transfer the images and metrics to PW and display them using Design Explorer
